title: Hunted by the Stag King
description: On a hunting trip in the woods of Oklahoma, Julia shoots a prize doe and celebrates with her boy-toy Mark. Soon after, a mysterious sleep drifts over them against their will, and just before Julia fades to slumber she sees something that couldn't be real. That shouldn't be real; something that when she wakes, will rock her world forever.*WARNING*THIS SHORT STORY HAS ROUGH, HARDCORE SCENES OF GRAPHIC FANTASY SEX. FOR ADULTS ONLY.
author: Tallia Ravejoy
